name: Tim Sullivan
coverLetter:
Hello,
I just returned to the United States after traveling the world for the past three years where I met several people who come to the U.S. to trim weed for the season. I returned to the country to do that also in California but the friends basically fell through for me and then I was hit with unexpected bills that I need to pay. I am available 24/7 and just want to trim and earn money. I have a car and can relocate anyplace that can provide me work. I can and will work 15 hours a day, seven days a week to make some money. I can pitch a tent or sleep in my car and pay all my own bills.
